Text: Re Interim Operational Accounting and Tax Services porvided by ENA Cc with the section written for settlements I would very much like to be included in your meeting Thanks Bob Enron North America Corp From Brenda F Herod PM To Trevor MihalikENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Robert CT Jim CT Karry CT Harold CT Sandra ct Jay CT Steve CT Rita CT Lisa CT Jefferson D CT Bob CT Kathryn CT Carrie ct Michael E CT cc Tommy J CT Shonnie CT Sally CT Brian CT Subject Interim Operational Accounting and Tax Services porvided by ENA The attached document is draft of the Interim services ENA will provide to Bridgeline Please review and provide any comments ASAP as we are working towards a FINAL version I will be coordinating a meeting for next week to review these services and provide a status If you are interested in attending please let me know Thanks Brenda

Re Friday luncheonWednesday would be great Should I come to your office Bob Sara Shackleton AM To Bob CT cc Subject Re Friday luncheon Bob can we talk or minutes either am or am on Wednesday or Thursday SS Bob Klein AM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Friday luncheon I am available on Wednesday or Thursday morning except for Wednesday morning Just let me know when and where Thanks Bob Sara Shackleton AM To Bob CT cc Subject Friday luncheon Bob Are there any issues that might be useful for your goup that I should address Also I would like to chat with you about settlements on multiple trades An interesting issue was raised in our credit lunch last week Please let me know when you are available Thanks Sara
